SENT.plain: Nonnet pseudotumorous syndrome was observed in 67 patients which died in psychiatric clinic
Clinicopathological characterization of the syndrome was performed
In 9.4% of the patients the brain tumors were verified
Other major causes of the malignant intracranial hypertensive syndrome were chronic hematomas, cerebral abscesses, collagenoses and degenerative CNS diseases
Neurological and mental disorders were described and their syndromokynesis peculiarities noted
The need in pathological service in psychiatric clinics is stressed
